content:
Outside, besides flowers and wild grass,
wouldn't it be fun to add some decorative items?
Like a swing, or maybe a little fountain?

{me}, I discovered that the items I craft aren't just for decorating indoors,
they work perfectly outdoors too,
now I can build my very own little garden~

I still get a bit confused when wandering around here.
Maybe if we laid down a path,
or put up some signs, it would be harder to get lost?
